channel.description: Recent content in aws on my tech ramblings

item.title: How to deploy a SignalR Core application to AWS
item.description: This post is about which AWS services can be used and how to set them up properly when you want to deploy a SignalR Core application to AWS.

item.title: Profiling a .NET6 app running on AWS ECS Fargate with dotnet-monitor
item.description: The dotnet-monitor tool is an alternative to the .NET CLI diagnostic tools. In this post I'll show you how to deploy a .NET 6 application into AWS ECS Fargate with dotnet-monitor as a sidecar container, and afterwards how you can profile an app using the dotnet-monitor HTTP API.

item.title: Getting started with AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry and distributed tracing using .NET. Part 2: Building the demo
item.description: This is a 2 part-series post. In part 2 I’ll show you how to build and configure properly a few distributed .NET apps that will send traces to the AWS OTEL Collector, and also how to analyze those traces in AWS X-Ray.

item.title: Getting started with AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry and distributed tracing using .NET. Part 1: Setting up the AWS OTEL Collector
item.description: This is a 2 part-series post. In part 1 I’ll be talking about what is the AWS OpenTelemetry Collector and how to set it up for ingesting and exporting traces to AWS X-Ray.

item.title: Testing how to use some container vulnerabilities scanners with Azure Pipelines
item.description: Vulnerability scanning allows us to review the security state of the container images and take actions to fix issues identified during the scan, resulting in more secure deployments. In this post I will be covering how you can use some of the most well-known scanners alongside with your Azure DevOps CI/CD YAML Pipelines.

item.title: Some common gotchas when trying to deploy a dotnet gRPC app to AWS ECS
item.description: Lately I've been deploying a sizable amount of gRPC services to AWS ECS so I thought it might be useful to talk a little bit about some gotchas I have encountered. Some of the problems I'll be talking about on this post are specific of the .NET implementation of gRPC and another ones are from the AWS side.

item.title: 4 ways to deploy a .NET Core Lambda using AWS CDK
item.description: In today's post I want to show you 4 available options for deploying a .NET Core lambda with AWS CDK.

item.title: An opinionated approach about how to create an AWS ECS Fargate cluster and deploy apps on it using Azure DevOps Pipelines
item.description: These past couple of weeks I've been tinkering with AWS ECS Fargate and after losing some time tackling different approaches I thought it might be useful to write down what I ended up building, so without further ado let's dig in.

item.title: Provisioning resources on AWS using AWS CDK and Azure DevOps Pipelines
item.description: In today's post I will show you how you can deploy an AWS CDK application using Azure DevOps.
